roleset.name: to extend across in space or time
roleset.note: SPAN-V NOTES: Based on survey of sentences in the WSJ. Member of VNcls contiguous_location-47.8. (from span.01-v)
SPAN-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet, span-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls contiguous_location-47.8. (from span.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: This is that the Reagan Revolution spanning Eastern Europe and Tiananmen Square shows the power of ideas unencumbered by international civil servants or government functionaries .

example.name: both args
example.text: The total length of the bridge is 3240 feet, .and its span over the river measures 1800 feet.
